00031 namespace Ogre {
00053     class GLSLProgram : public HighLevelGpuProgram
00054     {
00055     public:
00057         class CmdAttach : public ParamCommand
00058         {
00059         public:
00060             String doGet(const void* target) const;
00061             void doSet(void* target, const String& shaderNames);
00062         };
00063 
00064         GLSLProgram(ResourceManager* creator, 
00065             const String& name, ResourceHandle handle,
00066             const String& group, bool isManual, ManualResourceLoader* loader);
00067         ~GLSLProgram();
00068 
00069         const GLhandleARB getGLHandle() const { return mGLHandle; }
00070         void attachToProgramObject( const GLhandleARB programObject );
00071         String getAttachedShaderNames() const { return mAttachedShaderNames; }
00072 
00074         void attachChildShader(const String& name);
00076         const String& getLanguage(void) const;
00077 
00078     protected:
00079         static CmdAttach msCmdAttach;
00080 
00083         void loadFromSource(void);
00089         void createLowLevelImpl(void);
00091         void unloadHighLevelImpl(void);
00093         void populateParameterNames(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params);
00095         bool compile( const bool checkErrors = true);
00096

00101         GLint mCompiled;
00103         String mAttachedShaderNames;
